comment: There are many good men involved in the preservation of our White race, of course. But I get the impression the unironic "alt-right" has a large contingent of extremely immature young boys. There's no other way DS could still exist.
amr:
# ::snt There are many good men involved in the preservation of our White race, of course. But I get the impression the unironic "alt-right" has a large contingent of extremely immature young boys. There's no other way DS could still exist.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / involve-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / man
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                  :quant (m3 / many))
            :ARG2 (p / preserve-01
                  :ARG0 m2
                  :ARG1 (r / race
                        :ARG1-of (w / white-02)
                        :poss (w2 / we)))
            :mod (o / of-course))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (ii2 / impression-03
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (p2 / political-movement
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "alt-right")
                              :mod (ii4 / ironic
                                    :polarity -))
                        :ARG1 (c2 / contingent
                              :mod (l / large)
                              :consist-of (b / boy
                                    :mod (y / young)
                                    :ARG1-of (m4 / mature-02
                                          :polarity -
                                          :degree (e / extreme)))))))
      :snt3 (w3 / way
            :polarity -
            :mod (o2 / other)
            :manner-of (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (e2 / exist-01
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person
                              :name n
                              :op1 "DS"))
                  :time (s / still))))

comment: In a better world, yes, they should be capable of figuring this out. But I've stopped underestimating the stupidity and power of an online circle jerk.
amr:
# ::snt In a better world, yes, they should be capable of figuring this out. But I've stopped underestimating the stupidity and power of an online circle jerk.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (c / capable-01
                  :ARG1 (t / they)
                  :ARG2 (f / figure-out-05
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG1 (t2 / this))
                  :location (w / world
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02
                                    :ARG1 w)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more)))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (u / underestimate-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (s2 / stupidity
                                    :poss (j / jerk
                                          :mod (c3 / circle)
                                          :mod (o / online)))
                              :op2 (p / power
                                    :poss j))))))
